title: About
content:
The idea of the Girl Effect started 10 years ago when a group of people
started noticing that adolescent girls were doing some pretty amazing things
around the world. They watched and listened to what girls were doing and they
realised that, when given the chance, the girl is actually the most powerful
force for change on the planet - and they wanted others to know this too. More
people, including powerful people, started understanding that girls really do
have a special spark and could even end poverty for themselves, their
families, their communities and ultimately for the world. As more people
became aware of the power of girls, a movement started and this became known
as the Girl Effect. Today even more people are joining the Girl Effect, and we
hope you can join us too.
